resources.string: Some text could go here that says a little bit about how the app works and why they need to make an account, etc!
I am willing to take a chance at failure for the sake of innovation.
I would take a risk if there were something in it for me.
Before making a decision, I fail to anticipate the factors that could influence the outcome.
I don\’t typically check important projects carefully for mistakes before submitting them.
I don\’t worry that something unexpected might ruin all my plans.
I realize that past actions were more dangerous than I thought at the time.
I don\'t mind working on projects at work that could fail.
It bores me to know in advance what will happen at work.
If I take a risk and fail, I can handle the consequences.
Chance has a lot to do with being successful.

Your results indicate that you\’re neutral when it comes to risky decisions. If you\’re unsure about something, maybe you should re-evaluate; but then again, if you feel like taking a risk, go for it!
Your behavior leans towards risk-averse, meaning you prefer a sure outcome over a gamble. When making your decision, be sure to evaluate how risky each option is and add risk as a factor!
You are a risk-seeker! You enjoy the thrill of a gamble when considering multiple options. When making your decision, don\’t let the fear of the unknown stop you!
